density.note: Use Ideal Gas Law for other temperatures/pressures

idealGasLaw.note: Ethanol vapor behaves as ideal gas at low pressures

specificHeat.note: Cp at constant pressure; lower than liquid ethanol

thermalConductivity.note: Very poor conductor as a gas

electricalConductivity.note: Essentially an insulator as a gas

flammability.note: Ethanol vapor-air mixtures are explosive in this range; extreme fire hazard
